item.description:
Will our workshoppees see their shadows? Download their pieces in our Files section, read, comment, come to the meetup and find out! Keep an eye out for Thomas and Sarah's pieces in the Files section!

***

item.how_to_find_us: We will be a rather large group with notebooks and, in some cases, laptops.
item.name: A Groundhog's Workshop
